content:
I'm glad we cleared that up!

Ah, 150 messages in a WhatsApp group chat is impressive! It sounds like you and your friends are having a blast.

Coming back to relatable memes, I've got some great recommendations for you! Here are some popular Instagram accounts that specialize in relatable memes:

1. @memes - A classic meme page with a huge following. They post a wide range of relatable memes, from school struggles to adulting problems.
2. @relatablememe - As the name suggests, this page is dedicated to relatable memes. They cover topics like relationships, work, and everyday struggles.
3. @sarcasm_only - If you enjoy a healthy dose of sarcasm with your memes, this page is for you. They post relatable memes with a dash of humor and wit.
4. @dankmemes - This page has a huge collection of relatable memes, from gaming to pop culture references.
5. @lolz.memes - They post a mix of relatable memes, funny animal videos, and hilarious GIFs.

For funny animal videos, you might enjoy:

1. @animalsdoingthings - Exactly what it says on the tin! Adorable animals doing silly things.
2. @funnyanimals - A page dedicated to sharing funny and cute animal videos.
3. @pawsitivevibesonly - If you need a daily dose of cute, this page is for you. They post funny and heartwarming animal videos.

Make sure to check these out and follow the ones that tickle your funny bone!

Do you have a favorite type of relatable meme or theme that you'd like to see more of?
